sentences.sentence: The value of America decrease greatly between 2010 and 2011, then it increase with steady steps by 2014; while Britain, Dutch, India and Japan keep stable between 2010 and 2014.
The value of Dutch, America and Japan is greatly lower than others in 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013 and 2014.

sentences.sentence: The value of America decrease greatly between 2010 and 2011, then it increase with steady steps by 2014; while Britain, Dutch, India and Japan keep stable between 2010 and 2014.
The value of Dutch, America and Japan is greatly lower than others in 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013 and 2014.
